image.altText: ASX boards

props.synopsis: Australian stocks are on the rise after heavy losses, after several sessions of heavy selling, while investors worry about an economic slowdown. Follow the latest updates in our live blog.

image.altText: Am aerial shot of a house with solar panels along the top and two people standing on the lawn.

image.altText: Michele Bullock at microphone at RBA press conference

image.altText: A man in a royal blue suit, white shirt and light blue tie sits in a room with red carpet looking toward something out of frame

image.altText: Three women standing together.

props.synopsis: For residents of Altadena, hopes of rebuilding their community just as it was are facing mounting challenges.

image.altText: Seth

props.synopsis: Members of Australia's biggest superannuation fund say they asked about a key safeguard against online fraud before cyber thieves stole retirement savings.Â

image.altText: Australian surfer Isabella Nichols smiles as she carries her board up the beach after a heat at a pro tournament.
